metadata.title: CVE-2024-0093 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: NVIDIA GPU software for Linux contains a vulnerability where it can exposesensitive information to an actor that is not explicitly authorized to haveaccess to that information. A successful exploit of this vulnerabilitymight lead to information disclosure.
